title: VIDEO: Realcomm's CoRE Tech 2015 Is The #1 Event For Corporate Real Estate, Facilities & Innovation
text:
VIDEO: Realcomm's CoRE Tech 2015 Is The #1 Event For Corporate Real Estate, Facilities & Innovation CoRE Tech 2015 @ Silicon Valley, Nov. 10-11 YouTube Video 
CoRE Tech 2015 Silicon Valley CARLSBAD, CA, September 30,   Realcomm Conference Group launches the must-watch CoRE Tech 2015 video featuring conference information and highlights. Learn how the most innovative companies in Silicon Valley, as well as other thought-leaders from around the world, are coming together to define how technology, automation and innovation will impact the next generation of how we use and operate corporate space. CoRE Tech is the only premiere networking and educational event for the corporate real estate and facilities industry focused solely on technology, automation and innovation. For more information and to register, visit www.realcomm.com/coretech-2015 . About Realcomm Conference Group Realcomm Conference Group, LLC is the leading research and educational institution that produces annual conferences and expositions on technology, automated business solutions and intelligent buildings strategies for executives in commercial, corporate, government and institutional real estate. Realcomm was founded in 1999 with the goal of bringing industry leaders together each year to discuss, demonstrate and debate the latest innovations that impact the industry. Today, in addition to the annual conferences, Realcomm conducts webinars, workshops and other strategic services to educate industry professionals about the latest business solutions and technologies to improve commercial and corporate real estate development, leasing, management and operations. # # # Read more Press Releases from Cheri Parr:
